title: All-new Kindernay VII 7 Speed Internal Gear Hub gets 428% range & high torque capacity
content:
Building on the technology seen on their 14 Speed Internal Gear Hub, Norwegian component manufacturers Kindernay have released the all-new Kindernay VII 7 Speed Internal Gear Hub. Packing a gear range of 428% over 7 gears built around 10mm and 12mm thru-axles, the Kindernay VII is a viable and attractive option for riders looking to

The post All-new Kindernay VII 7 Speed Internal Gear Hub gets 428% range & high torque capacity appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
